General.Name: Crown Confectionery Co Ltd
General.Description: Crown Confectionery Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells confectionery products in Korea. It offers biscuits, cakes, snacks, candies, and chocolates. The company offers its products primarily under the Heim, Couque D'Asse, Sando, Vic Pie, Jolly Pong, C: Corn-Chip, Shinzzang, and Mychew brands. The company was founded in 1947 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
